text.tspan: Scenario 1: Network Timeout with Exponential Backoff
Blocking judge failed → Escalate to human review
Scenario 3: Evidence Gathering Timeout → Partial Results + Prompt
Scenario 4: Max Retries Exceeded → Hard Escalation
Max retries exceeded → Hard escalation required
Scenario 5: Deadline Warning with Urgency Escalation
Network Timeout → Exponential backoff (1s, 2s, 4s) max 3 retries
Judge Failure (blocking) → Human escalation with full context
Specialist Timeout → Partial results + merchant prompt for gaps
Max Retries Exceeded → Hard escalation + deadline protection

svg.text: "I need human review for this evidence.
"Visa system is unavailable after multiple attempts.
Escalated to your dispute team lead"
Error Recovery: Timeout, Judge Failure, and Retry Flows
